title: How to take a screenshot in a laptop and computer - Quora

response.answer_text: Its just simple in windows (don’t know about others), you might have seen a key named “prt sc” or print screen use this and you won’t need any other or some special software. Steps: Press “prt sc” which you want to screen-shot.Go to “Paint” and apply the shortcut for paste i.e. ‘ Ctrl+V ’.Save as the document in paint to the format you want (ex. jpg, jpeg, etc.)Hopefully this helps in other cases too… Prt sc on laptop:

In windows, 1) Press PrntScr button on your laptop. 2) Go to Paint. 3) Press Ctrl+V (i.e. paste it) 4) Save it. That's all i do, when i want to take a screenshot, there might be other ways too. but i am not aware of those.
